channel.title: Alex's Thoughts on It's Alex Again

item.title: Flying Solo With Baby
item.description: At 4 months I took my first flight with my baby boy. Alone! And I’m happy to report that flying with a baby isn’t as bad as you might fear.

item.title: How to Stay In Touch With Your Personal Goals as a New Mom

item.title: Link Dump
item.description: An Unorganized Collection of Links https://janezhang.ca/posts/building-website-with-hugo/ This post outlines the beginner’s hugo experience very well, with many useful tips.
